bird_report.population_trend_additional_info: Before the mid-nineties, the Great Bittern was a rare winter visitor of Luxembourg. Since then, numbers increased and stabilised around 2000 at 5-8 individuals per winter and year.
bird_report.measures_taken: Management plan for and legal protection of Natura2000-site "Haff Réimech" Wetland restauration, in particular reedbeds, and improvment of hydrological regime Acquisition of reedbeds for nature conservation Bittern-Survey

bird_report.measures_taken: Legal protection. Monitoring of calling males at potential and known breeding sites. Maintaining unmown meadows till 1st of August in sites with calling males (and potential breeders). Extensification of grasslands and install late-mowing regimes.
bird_report.further_information: A national Species Action Plan "Crex crex" is in preparation.
